entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 15.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming sunny near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 5.
